column4: I love grub ;-). Can you tell me what the problem is, I missed it
I love grub too
ilovebrownies wants to have access to his arch install too
what are you doing the setup cmd for?
is ubuntu's grub installed? or arch
and I was explaining him how to chainload the arch grub so he doesn't have to change his ubuntu menu'lst everytime arch updates
is grub installed on arch?
I have never done chain loading before
is grub on arch?
you there?
sorry
was here
I gave him instructions how to install grub to his arch /boot partition
from ilovebrownies' comments I assume he has an arch install that uses grub
to do what?
normally you isntall grub to the mbr
but you can't use two different configs with just one grub install
I know, but if you are chainloading, you need to install it to /boot on arch
I know
yes, so I explained him how to install grub to his arch /boot :P
and that's where he is now
isn't there an easy package to install grub in arch?
he has grub installed in arch
he just needs to install it to the arch /boot partition, because normally it gets installed to the mbr so you can use it...
